mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_comment_id as feedCommentId ,a.comment ,b.user_id as writerUserId ,IF(b.nick_name is null,b.uid,b.nick_name) as writerNm ,b.pic as writerPic FROM feed_comment a INNER JOIN user b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.feed_id=#{feedId} ORDER BY A.FEED_comment_ID DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{size}
